headline: VetsInTech Celebrates 11th Anniversary Gala on November 7
summary: VetsInTech, the leading national non-profit organization dedicated to supporting veterans through tech-based initiatives in education, employment, and entrepreneurship, announced its 11th Annual Fall Gala, scheduled for Friday, November 7, starting at 6:00 pm PT. The in-person event will honor Veterans Day and raise funds for educational scholarships for veterans and military spouses to launch careers and companies in technology.

The in-person event will honor Veterans Day and raise funds for educational scholarships for veterans and military spouses to launch careers and companies in technology.

headline: Amazon on Pace for All-Time High After OpenAI Deal
summary: Shares of Amazon are on track to close at a new all-time high after the cloud company reached a $38 billion multi-year deal with OpenAI.  The deal, which marks the first partnership between the two companies, is still tiny compared to those OpenAI has signed with other cloud leaders, including a $300 billion deal with Oracle and a $250 billion commitment to Microsoft.  Amazon stock was up nearly 5% Monday morning.

raw.headline: Amazon on Pace for All-Time High After OpenAI Deal

The deal, which marks the first partnership between the two companies, is still tiny compared to those OpenAI has signed with other cloud leaders, including a $300 billion deal with Oracle and a $250 billion commitment to Microsoft.  Amazon stock was up nearly 5% Monday morning.

headline: OpenAI and Amazon ink $38B cloud computing deal
summary: OpenAI isn't done securing the AI infrastructure it needs to rapidly scale agentic workloads. The ChatGPT-maker on Monday said it has reached a deal with Amazon to buy $38 billion in cloud computing services over the next seven years.

raw.headline: OpenAI and Amazon ink $38B cloud computing deal
raw.summary: OpenAI isn't done securing the AI infrastructure it needs to rapidly scale agentic workloads. The ChatGPT-maker on Monday said it has reached a deal with Amazon to buy $38 billion in cloud computing services over the next seven years.

headline: Google owner Alphabet to tap US, euro bond markets
summary: Google owner Alphabet is tapping the U.S. dollar and euro debt markets in a multi-tranche senior unsecured notes offering. The digital media and tech giant will use the proceeds from the note sale for general corporate purposes, including the potential repayment of a portion of its outstanding debt, according to a Monday report by Moody's Ratings. Alphabet last took out fresh debt in April, tapping the euro debt market for 6.75 billion euros ($7.87 billion) for the first time.

Alphabet last took out fresh debt in April, tapping the euro debt market for 6.75 billion euros ($7.87 billion) for the first time.

headline: Amazon Stock Jumps on $38 Billion OpenAI Deal. What We Know.
summary: FEATURE  OpenAI and Amazon.com have reached a $38 billion agreement for Amazon Web Services to provide infrastructure for the ChatGPT maker’s artificial-intelligence workloads. The partnership will begin immediately and covers the next seven years, the companies announced Monday.

raw.headline: Amazon Stock Jumps on $38 Billion OpenAI Deal. What We Know.
raw.summary: FEATURE  OpenAI and Amazon.com have reached a $38 billion agreement for Amazon Web Services to provide infrastructure for the ChatGPT maker’s artificial-intelligence workloads. The partnership will begin immediately and covers the next seven years, the companies announced Monday.

headline: Amazon stock jumps on $38 billion deal with OpenAI to use hundreds of thousands of Nvidia chips
summary: Amazon announced a multi-year $38 billion deal with OpenAI that would allow the ChatGPT developer to access hundreds of thousands of Nvidia's AI chips through its cloud computing infrastructure.

headline: MongoDB taps Cloudflare executive Chirantan Desai as CEO
summary: Desai will succeed Dev Ittycheria, who is stepping down after more than 11 years leading the company.  Shares of MongoDB rose 5% following the announcement.  Desai, a veteran technology executive with over 25 years of experience, previously also held senior roles at ServiceNow, EMC, Symantec and Oracle.

headline: Green Investors Enjoy Huge Returns as Stock Market Powers Through Trump’s Attacks
summary: The S&P’s main gauge tracking clean energy is up about 50% this year; the MSCI World Index has gained less than 20% in the same period.  Much of that development is pegged to a near-insatiable demand for energy to power the data centers feeding artificial intelligence.  For investors, those factors have outweighed Trump’s attacks on what he often calls the “green scam.”

raw.headline: Green Investors Enjoy Huge Returns as Stock Market Powers Through Trump’s Attacks

For investors, those factors have outweighed Trump’s attacks on what he often calls the “green scam.”

headline: Broadpin Wins 2025 Oracle Global Service Partner Tech/Cloud Customer Success Award
summary: Broadpin, a global Oracle consulting leader formed from the unification of Project Partners, PROMATIS, Quistor, and PITSS, has been named the Winner of the 2025 Oracle Global Service Partner Tech/Cloud Customer Success Award. The recognition was announced during the Oracle Partner Success Summit at Oracle AI World 2025 in Las Vegas, coinciding with Broadpin's official brand launch.
